channel.title: NPR: Shuffle Podcast
channel.description: NPR Shuffle mixes it up every day, offering an unpredictable sampler from 'Morning Edition', 'All Things Considered' and other award-winning NPR programs. Enjoy listening to this podcast just as you would enjoy listening to NPR - ready to be surprised by the next great story!
channel.copyright: Copyright 2007 NPR - For Personal Use Only
channel.itunes:summary: NPR Shuffle mixes it up every day, offering an unpredictable sampler from 'Morning Edition', 'All Things Considered' and other award-winning NPR programs. Enjoy listening to this podcast just as you would enjoy listening to NPR - ready to be surprised by the next great story!

channel.itunes:keywords: NPR,Shuffle,NPR,National Public Radio,Shuffle,Washington,District of Columbia,Morning Edition,All Things Considered,Fresh Air
